言寄る: (いいよる) - to court; to woo; to approach defiantly

言忘れる: (いいわすれる) - to forget to say; to forget to mention

言掛かり: (いいがかり) - false accusation; pretext; commitment
言掛けて止める: (いいかけてやめる) - to stop in the middle of a sentence
言掛ける: (いいかける) - to start to say/to attempt to say/to be about to say/to break off (mid-sentence); to speak to/to address

言換える: (いいかえる) - to say in other words; to put another way; to express in different words; to reword; to rephrase

言改める: (いいあらためる) - to correct oneself

言替える: (いいかえる) - to say in other words; to put another way; to express in different words; to reword; to rephrase
言替えるなら: (いいかえるなら) - if we put this another way; in other words; put differently
言条: (いいじょう) - an excuse; however; nonetheless
言様がない: (いいようがない) - indescribable; having no way to express
言止す: (いいさす) - to break off (mid-sentence); to stop (saying)

言草: (いいぐさ) - remarks/comments; way of talking/speaking style; excuse; topic (of conversation)
言落す: (いいおとす) - to omit; to forget to mention; to leave unspoken
